results.name: Daryl F. Gates' Police Quest: Open Season
The Odyssey: The Search for Ulysses

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS / Linux Mint 17
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any 100% OpenGL capable (Card or Onboard)
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any ALSA supported card on onboard audio
  • Additional Notes: 3D graphics card or onboard graphics compatible with DirectX 9.0c
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS / Linux Mint 18
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any 100% OpenGL capable (Card or Onboard)
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any ALSA supported card on onboard audio
  • Additional Notes: 3D graphics card or onboard graphics compatible with DirectX 9.0c
